Title: Audrey Burnhep
Description:
Greetings, $n! My name is Audrey Burnhep. I've been hearing quite a lot about you recently. You're becoming quite the tamer!

You should come speak with me in Stormwind. I have connections with some of the finest tamers in all of Azeroth, and I can help you grow even more!
ObjectivesText: Report to Audrey Burnhep in Stormwind.
PortraitGiverText: I can't wait to meet you!
